UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: An anti-infective synthetic peptide with dual antimicrobial and immunomodulatory activities.
Literature.Author: Silva ON, de la Fuente-Núnez C, Haney EF, Fensterseifer IC,  Ribeiro SM, Porto WF, Brown P, Faria-Junior C, Rezende TMB, Moreno SE, Lu TK, Hancock RE, Franco OL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Vero cells:50% Cell death=200 µg/ml,Mouse erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=200 µM,Mouse fibroblasts L929:LC50=>600 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:LC50=>600 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 10231(20-30% Inhibition=128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(0-10% Inhibition=128µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(LC50=37µM),Aichi virus(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=1.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 12953(MIC=1.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=24.0µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=6.0µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=6.0µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=12.0µM),Escherichia coli KPC 001812446(MIC=6.0µM),Escherichia coli KPC 002101123(MIC=6.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13885(MIC=3.0µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPC 001825971(MIC=3.0µM),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=6.0µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=3.0µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=3.0µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(LC50=>600µM)
